tasks.name: Implement field-level logging in Enhanced Logger
tasks.description: Add field-level change tracking to enhanced logger service. Log every field change with before/after values.

instructions.details: Enhance enhanced-logger.js to support field-level logging. Add logFieldChange(fieldName, oldValue, newValue, userId, timestamp) method. Store field changes in Firebase with structure: /audit_logs/{recordId}/changes/{fieldName}/{timestamp}. This is CRITICAL for Phase 2 audit features.

tasks.name: Add audit trail generation
tasks.description: Add audit trail generation functionality to create comprehensive change history.

instructions.details: Add generateAuditTrail(recordId) method that retrieves all field changes for a record and formats them as an audit trail. Return chronological list of all changes with user, timestamp, field, old value, new value.

tasks.name: Enhance State Manager for view state
tasks.description: Enhance state manager to handle view state, sidebar state, and layout state.

instructions.details: Enhance crm-state.js to add view state management. Add setView(viewName), getCurrentView(), setSidebarState(collapsed), getSidebarState(), setLayoutState(layoutConfig), getLayoutState() methods. Store state in memory with optional persistence to localStorage.

tasks.name: Enhance Sidebar with new navigation items
tasks.description: Enhance sidebar component to include new navigation items for views (Table, Kanban, Timeline, Card).

instructions.details: Enhance sidebar.js to add navigation items for: Table View, Kanban View, Timeline View, Card View. Add active state indicators. Integrate with state manager for view switching.

tasks.name: Implement multi-column layouts for desktop
tasks.description: Create CSS for multi-column desktop layouts optimized for 1200px+ screens.

instructions.details: Add CSS for multi-column desktop layouts. Create .desktop-layout-2col, .desktop-layout-3col classes. Use CSS Grid for responsive columns. Optimize for 1200px+ screens. Add media queries for desktop breakpoint.
